mapper.insert: insert into sys_flswcl (clientName,reportNum,inquireTime,inquireType,inquireer, inquireerPhone,inquireerEmail,reportBrief,givenFiles,suggestions,worker,workTime, workerPhone,approver,resultFileName,replyTime,replyType,genFileUrl , genFileName , genTime, status , nextApprover) values(#{clientName},#{reportNum},#{inquireTime},#{inquireType},#{inquireer}, #{inquireerPhone},#{inquireerEmail},#{reportBrief},#{givenFiles},#{suggestions},#{worker},#{workTime}, #{workerPhone},#{approver},#{resultFileName},#{replyTime},#{replyType},#{genFileUrl} , #{genFileName} , #{genTime},#{status},#{nextApprover});
insert into flswcl_status (flswId , status , genFileUrl , genFileName , genTime , handler) values (#{flswId} , #{status} , #{genFileUrl} , #{genFileName} , #{genTime} , #{handler})
mapper.select:
select * from sys_flswcl where 1=1
and clientName like CONCAT('%','${query_clientName}','%' )
and worker like CONCAT('%','${query_worker}','%' )
ORDER BY id desc
limit #{startIndex} , #{rows}
select * from sys_flswcl where worker=#{worker} ORDER BY id desc limit #{startIndex} , #{rows}
select * from sys_flswcl where nextApprover=#{approver} ORDER BY id desc limit #{startIndex} , #{rows}
select * from sys_flswcl where id = (select flswId from flswcl_status where approver=#{approver}) ORDER BY id desc limit #{startIndex} , #{rows}
select * from sys_flswcl where 1=1 and id=#{id}
select count(*) total from sys_flswcl where worker=#{worker}
select count(*) total from sys_flswcl where approver=#{approver}
select count(*) total from sys_flswcl where approver=#{approver} and status=#{status}
select * from flswcl_status where flswId =#{id} ORDER BY id asc
mapper.update: update sys_flswcl set genFileUrl=#{genFileUrl} , genFileName=#{genFileName} , status=#{status} , nextApprover=#{nextApprover} where id=#{flswId}
